qas.question: Which Ratchet & Clank title debuted at E3 2007?

answers.text: Ratchet & Clank Future: Tools of Destruction

context: At E3 <b6_0>2007<b6_0/>, Sony was able to show a number of their upcoming video games for PlayStation 3, including Heavenly Sword, Lair, <a0_0><b9_0>Ratchet & Clank Future: Tools of Destruction<b9_0/><a0_0/>, Warhawk and <b5_0>Uncharted: Drake's Fortune<b5_0/>; all of which were released in the third and fourth quarters of <a1_0><b10_0>2007<b10_0/><a1_0/>. They also showed off a number of titles that were set for release in 2008 and 2009; most notably Killzone 2, Infamous, <a3_0><b12_0>Gran Turismo 5 Prologue<b12_0/><a3_0/>, LittleBigPlanet and SOCOM: U.S. Navy SEALs Confrontation. A number of third-party exclusives were also shown, including the highly anticipated Metal Gear Solid 4: Guns of the Patriots, alongside other high-profile third-party titles such as Grand Theft Auto IV, Call of Duty 4: Modern Warfare, Assassin's Creed, <a4_0><b13_0>Devil May Cry 4<b13_0/><a4_0/> and Resident Evil 5. Two other important titles for PlayStation 3, <b7_0><b8_0>Final Fantasy XIII and Final Fantasy Versus XIII<b8_0/><b7_0/>, were shown at <a2_0><b11_0>TGS 2007<b11_0/><a2_0/> in order to appease the Japanese market.
